content: pattern is japanese but fully charted using standard knitting and/or crochet symbols for help using japanese charted patterns please visit the japanese knitting & crochet group 1 translation requests can be made in this thread 2 easy to follow without knowing japanese the text in the box at top right is redundant so *don t worry if you can t read it* - all the important stuff is in the chart **the entire basket is meant to be worked with two strands of yarn held together ** **note ** if you like this pattern you may also like other free basket patterns from pierrot natural basket 3 kirakira hemp square basket 4 linen accessory case 5 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/japanese-knitting-and-crochet 2 http //www ravelry com/discuss/pierrot-yarns/884508/ 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/27-28-mc-rg301-natural-basket 4 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/27-g741c-kirakira-hemp-square-basket 5 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/amikomo-5-linen-accessory-case
